version_description: Bug fixes
Bug fixes

** Eventbrite helps you discover popular local events and unique experiences. Invite your friends, get tickets and go! **

- Bug fixes
- Performance improvements

** Eventbrite helps you discover popular local events and unique experiences. Invite your friends, get tickets and go! **
- Streamlined listing: See your personalized event recommendations in a single column
- Better labels and #hashtag navigation: You can tap on the event category or format #hashtags to see a list of those types of events.
- Profile pages: See your tickets, saved events and interests on one page.
- New event card design: Event cards include the new 2:1 aspect ratio event images and more labels.
- New font: Updated to match Eventbrite’s new site font.

** Eventbrite helps you discover popular local events and unique experiences. Invite your friends, get tickets and go! **
- Support for Apple Watch
- Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements

** Eventbrite helps you discover popular local events and unique experiences. Invite your friends, get tickets and go! **
- Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements

** Eventbrite helps you discover popular local events and unique experiences. Invite your friends, get tickets and go! **
- Added fix for log in issues

** Eventbrite helps you discover popular events and unique experiences. Invite your friends, get tickets and go! **

- EVENT ORGANIZERS: We've moved our organizer features to Eventbrite Neon so you have more control to track your sales, manage attendees and sell tickets.
- We've made updates to make the purchasing experience more streamlined

** Eventbrite helps you discover popular local events and unique experiences. Invite your friends, get tickets and go! **
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements
Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements

We made you some updates

You might like
We’ll show you top recommendations based on events you saved or attended.

On your time
Now you can search for stuff in any time range that works.

Oh, hey you
Store and share your credentials in the iCloud Keychain for fast, secure login.

Found ‘em
We’ll group all tickets to the same event in one spot.

Fast pass that
Log in to get super-fast access to your tickets and quicker check-in at the door.

Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements
Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements

• Event recommendations on feed are now better.
• New onboarding: Users can now set their location and account when using the app for the first time.
• Search UI was updated.
• Searching by location now runs under a new algorithm.

• Event recommendations on feed are now better.
• New onboarding: Users can now set their location and account when using the app for the first time.
• Search UI was updated.
• Searching by location now runs under a new algorithm.

Meet Eventbrite 7.2.4. In this update:
- Numerous minor improvements and fixes!

Meet Eventbrite 7.0.2. In this update:
-Numerous minor improvements and fixes!

Meet Eventbrite 6.5.0. In this update you’ll find:
- Our Notification Center: Get personalized updates about upcoming events from organizers you follow and events you like.
- Improvements in our search experience: Looking for a death metal show or an aromatherapy yoga class? We can help you find the events you’re looking for!
- Numerous other minor improvements and fixes.

Meet Eventbrite 6.6.4. In this update:
- Numerous minor improvements and fixes!

Meet Eventbrite 6.6.2. In this update you will find:

- Improvements in our search experience: Looking for a death metal show or an aromatherapy yoga class? We added quick filters to our search experience so you can easily find what you’re looking for.
- More events to enjoy with friends!
- Bug fixes and minor improvements related to login, push notifications, search results, app stability - and more.

Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements

Meet Eventbrite 6.3.2. In this update:
- Facebook login: Now our users can easily sign into the Eventbrite app using Facebook.
- Numerous minor improvements and fixes!

User’s information security was reinforced, particularly on payment flow
Sharing your event from the order confirmation page is now easier
Now you can delete searches
Now you can archive tickets from past events attended
Be notified when your event is about to start
Share your feedback thru our new ‘Suggest improvements’ flow
Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements

- Updated UI
- Event Search by Specific Dates
- Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements

Meet Eventbrite 6.1.0. In this update:
• Follow organizers: Now you can follow your favourite organizers and see their upcoming events
• Improved experience for offline tickets management: save your tickets to Apple Wallet directly from the ticket screen or as images whenever you need
• Bug fixing and performance improvement
Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements

*Meet Eventbrite 6.2.0. In this update:*
• New tickets tab: Easily find all your upcoming and past tickets on the tickets tab
• Improved profile experience
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

Meet Eventbrite 6.4.0. In this update:
- Articles: Get the best from our suggested list of articles, now available from the Eventbrite feed
- Event page improvements: Swipe right to close event pages and go back to the previous screen. Also, easily find organizers refund policy and event age limit, if available.
- Fixed issue with follow synchronization
- Numerous minor improvements and fixes!

Meet Eventbrite 6.6.0:
- With this release, we’re happy to share our latest improvements to search: we’ve included search suggestions based on matches and popular searches so you can find the events you’re looking for! We’ll be updating and improving the search experience over time as we develop and add features. Stay tuned!
- Also on this version, you will find numerous other minor improvements and fixes

Meet Eventbrite 7.0.0. In this update:
• Reminders: Never have FOMO again thanks to our new 'Remind Me' button on event pages. Get a reminder right when tickets are going on sale.
• Search filters: New filters in our search experience make it easy to find events you're looking for. Search by mood, event category, or price.
• Plus: Renewed user interface, improved stability, and bug fixes.

Meet Eventbrite 7.1. In this update:
-Favorites Tab: Now you can find your favorites in one place. Your favorite events and organizers will be now available under the heart icon, so you can find them easily and start planning your next experience.
- Numerous minor improvements and fixes

Meet Eventbrite 7.1.1. In this update:

Meet Eventbrite 7.2. In this update:
- Collections tab: Collections bring you the best events, curated by experts. Follow collections to be the first to know when new events are added (Only available at selected cities). Create collections on web and have them at hand on your mobile device.
- Numerous minor improvements and fixes.

Meet Eventbrite 7.2.1. In this update:

- Numerous minor improvements and fixes.

Meet Eventbrite 7.2.2. In this release we fixed some bugs, like the inability to scroll on event page details (iOS 13 compatibility).
We also integrated recommended collections based on your location. Collections bring you the best events, curated by experts (Only available in selected cities).

- UX improvements: timezone adjustments. Clearly understand when the events are about to start
- Refund improvements: now you will get to know what’s your refund status

Meet Eventbrite 8.2.0. In this update:
- Online curated content: discover new events to attend with our online collections.
- UX improvements to help you find the link to attend an online event.
- New refund method: you will be able to ask for an account credit, valid to use on any of the organiser future events. (This is available depending on the event’s refund policy set by the organiser)
- Several bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Several bug fixes and performance improvements.
